article: Jasmine Harman,a famous TV presenter, was sunny and active. Nothing seemed to  _  her down. And she'd be  _  if you ever tried to clear them up," Jasmine recalled. Eventually, the entire family couldn't have a  _  life. Two years ago, Jasmine did something  _  .
